name: Glimpse (itch)
description:
Glimpse - a TOJam 48-hour game

Credits:

Brent Mitchell (Brentgmitchell@outlook.com, @brentthemitch)
Douglas Gregory
Marius Masalar
Philippe McNally

Notes:

With a Kinect set up, there is mostly-functional Blink Tracking. Control the game with mouse and keyboard and let your blinks change the world.

(Our demo used an IR emitter for even better accuracy.)

In the absence of a Kinect, use left click to simulate a Blink. Hold it for just more than a moment.
